A Heffalump is a type of fictional elephant in the Winnie the Pooh stories by A. A. 
Milne. Heffalumps are mentioned, and only appear, in Pooh and Piglet's dreams 
in Winnie-the-Pooh (1926) and seen again in The House at Pooh Corner (1928). 
Physically, they resemble elephants; Shepard's illustration shows an Indian ...
